website_summaries.verdict: A top seller in sticky bras due to its affordable price, range of available sizes, and overall effectiveness.
pros: Bra stays on in mildly sweaty conditions
An affordable choice for someone on a budget or someone looking to try a sticky bra for the first time
cons: There's a bit of a learning curve to putting it on, though the directions are helpful
A few reports that the larger sizes may add a bit of sag to the chest

customer_reviews.title: Not as supportive as I'd like, but works well for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually wear adhesive bras so this review is coming from someone who doesn't have much experience with them, but I thought this one was pretty good. The instructions to attach and clean the bra make sense, the bra provides good coverage and doesn't create any unflattering lines under tops, and it stays on securely. I didn't rate this product higher because the stickiness is somewhat uncomfortable if you sweat in the bra and because I personally prefer more support along my sides. Otherwise, this bra works well for backless dresses or tops with large cutouts. Disclaimer: I received this product to test, but my opinions are still my own.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Looks terrible
customer_reviews.text: So, I only tried these on once, so I cannot attest to how long the adhesive works, but they looked so terrible I could never actually wear them out anywhere. The adhesive did, indeed, stick, and it seemed like it would stay stuck, but the shape of these cups is all wrong. They squashed me into an unnatural dome shape and pinched me in all around the edges of the cup. Hard to describe, but awful. I peeled them right off and put them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: M. B. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: What i was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. This one has fabric on outside and is lightweight. I've never had a problem with them out in the heat. The others that are all silicone are too heavy and drag the "girls" down which is NOT a flattering look nor is it comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: A big surprise for small chest
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought my girls were a little too small for the cups even for the size A bra, but it turns out I was just applying them in the wrong direction. So please be sure to read the instructions carefully and pay close attention to the provided images.. This bra stuck amazingly and to my surprise it was even able to create a small amount of cleavage. Which is saying alot for my 32 A breast size! Bra is well hidden in low cut tops and the fact that it's backless makes for a great bra to wear with any shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Dunahoo

customer_reviews.title: Poor coverage and support
customer_reviews.text: This product is not made for women that have breasts that are larger in size. It doesn’t offer enough coverage. Also, if you’ve had children this may not be good for you because let’s face it, our boobs change and don’t have the natural perkiness they used too. This doesn’t offer any support or coverage. As a mother of 3, with a C-D size bra, this was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Run_Dealsrun

customer_reviews.title: Seriously.. best bra I’ve ever bought wow
customer_reviews.text: OH WOW😍 where do I begin??? So I was very skeptical of trying this Bra... I’ve seen them at a ton of stores.. I’ve seen them online, but I never heard anyone’s first hand experience with them... so I finally took the leap and ordered it. I was not disappointed!! This bra is absolutely amazing. It push ups just the right amount. I don’t feel overwhelmed with straps everywhere. It is seriously the best bra ever! Shipping was also next day and the buyer is absolutely amazing!! They helped me with sizing and answered all of my questions almost immediately. I will be buying from them again in the future. I’m super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Avy

customer_reviews.title: Not really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: If I bend over to tie my shoe or pick stuff off the ground the adhesive comes loose to the point I need to firmly push them back on and hope they didn't move out of place too much. The adhesive is a bit annoying feeling. Slightly irritating after awhile. Other than that I really think they are good for those shirts or dresses where you don't want the straps to show. I think I should have purchased one where it doesn't try to be a pushup bra where it really emphasizes the breasts. I wear a size A, so there is nothing there to push up really, so it's just uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Happy Tatas!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. I am large busted and typically have bad luck with strapless bras. I didn’t have high hopes for a sticky bra lol. I found the instructions pretty easy to follow. The sticky was weird at first, but I stopped noticing after awhile. I was able to wear it comfortably for an entire evening in a humid environment. I was VERY happy with the way my breast looked! I breastfed 3 kiddos for an accumulative 5 years... my tatas are sad and saggy. I loved the lift this sticky bra gave!
customer_reviews.author: Slinkyallstar

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive is TERRIBLE, waste of $
customer_reviews.text: I had a Nubra before and after about 3 years it was sticky. Didn't want to pay $35 for a new NuBra but wish I had. This bra seemed fine at first but I wore it once and by the end of the night it was falling off. I went to a wedding were I only danced a few dances, so it's not like I was really sweaty. This bra just lost it's stickiness after a few hours. I wish I could return it but not going to do that with a product I wore. I just threw the bra out. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nugget

customer_reviews.title: Invisible under clothes
customer_reviews.text: I have smaller boobs so wearing stick on bras always makes me nervous to not make them look smaller. I wore it To work just to test it out before wearing it out where I would get sweaty dancing. It gave them a nice shape similar to them I wear a tshirt bra. Gave good cleavage and I couldnt see it through my top. Didn’t have an issue with it coming unstuck. It stayed in perfect place for the entire day. At one point I even forgot I was wearing a bra!!! I can’t wait to go out now and wear it again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JAV

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth The Buy
customer_reviews.text: This bra is now easily one of my favorites now. (I'm a size c for reference.) Usually I have to tighten my bras pretty tight, or else it just "sits" on me since i don't have a very big torso. This causes a lot of pressure on the straps, so that rubbing against my skin plus my body heat and hot days.. its just miserable! This bra is the perfect solution for discomfort especially on hot days that you can't go bra-less. It's a perfect fit and just.. wow! The stick is actually perfect. Super strong yet it doesn't hurt at all. I totally reccomend this, either for a lift, you want a strapless look, or simply discomfort/pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kora

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I had really low expectations for the product having owned different pairs of silicone chicken cutlets before, but this was actually very well made and the adhesive is strong enough to stay on your breasts without fear of falling apart. I'm sure it worked better than some of my $30+ silicone cutlets due to the material being fabric (which is lighter than silicone, causing it less likely to sag). For my fellow ladies with wide-set breasts, the adhesive will work in your favor to give you that lift you normally wouldn't expect from strapless bras!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Weirdly shaped boobs
customer_reviews.text: I found this bra to give me the strangest breast shape! If you have higher, perky, smaller breasts, look elsewhere because these sit kinda high up (at least on me) and if you're wearing a low cut top you can see the top of the bra. It's kind of tacky imo to wear clear straps, but perhaps they're better than these as a last resort. Honestly, making the pads thicker would've helped because then I could place them lower without them bending out of shape....
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Works as far as I can tell..
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried this on one time with a dress that requires either no bra or an invisible bra that I plan on wearing this summer. It took a few times to get it right, first time using something like this but stayed put once on correctly. I do not know if it will last for a few hours, will find out I guess!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Constantly having to press to keep stuck
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a couple of these types of bras to compare. This one has the best shape so far and doesn't make your breast look flat, however the adhesive on my left cup does not stick well after one wear and it's frustrating. I have to constantly secretly press through out the night to make sure it stays on. I know now for a fact that this shape is the better one I don't know if ill order this brand again. Also, I am Hispanic and have a tan, this color stands out against my skin when wearing light colors and the bra is visible.
customer_reviews.author: Amarie

customer_reviews.title: This bra is perfect for your backless outfits!
customer_reviews.text: I tried out my push up strapless bra today and was really impressed! I have a sizable bust and this bra clung to me all day with no slippage and no worries that it was going to unstick. This bra is ideal for a backless strapless dress or romper and it was extremely comfortable to wear! It came with clear straightforward instructions for application and was easy to put on and clasp. For size reference: I’m a 36DDD and bought the D cup, and it stayed on really well which was a very pleasant surprise for me! It was also easy and pain free to remove, plus it’s reusable! 10/10 would recommend! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Probably would work great for less busty ladies.....
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying that I typically wear a 34DD or 34DDD in bra size. I'm usually pretty skeptical about these types of bras just due to my cup size. I would say that I'm not overly impressed by the product. It does the job. However I did have an issue with the cups being to small which I somewhat expected. That being said I do believe that this bra would be a great option for my less bustier ladies. It does a pretty good job at sticking to you and pushing up. In the future I would like to see more inclusiveness for larger cup sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie98

customer_reviews.title: You need this bra!
customer_reviews.text: I recently have been looking for a strapless bra and the reviews brought me to this page. Delivery was extremely fast! I used this with a low back dress that I've kept in my closet for far too long! I'm a B cup so the fit was perfect for me. Definitely follow the directions to get a comfortable fit and to clip it properly to give you that lift. The adhesive stayed on, despite the summer heat! Removal was easy and can't wait to try it with some other dresses/shirts I have that are backless. Great value and product - I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Iloveagooddeal

customer_reviews.title: Great self adhesive bra!
customer_reviews.text: I have several shirts & dresses that are "backless or low back" and they now look great with this bra! I had been wanting a bra without the straps & a back for a while but didn't know where to start. It took me several tries to get it positioned right but I followed the instructions which really helped. It fits nicely, doesn't leave any visible lines & seems comfortable. It is very sticky! So far, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: L.R.A.

customer_reviews.title: True to size, my new go-to house bra
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I have been looking for. I have 3 kids, so my breasts arent perky the way they used to be, but i cant stand wesring traditional bras. These were super sticky but didnt hurt when i took them off. I have used them now 3 days in a row. They still work perfect. I am a stay home mom, so these are perfect to.wear under my tank tops that i lounge in, as protectionn and a modest uplifting feeling. I will definitely order more. I wear a size 36D, so i orderes the D and tbey fit very true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fall off.
customer_reviews.text: I am a busy person at work and constantly am moving around. I tried out this bra for the day at work.....and took an extra regular bra in case we had issues with this Push up Strapless Self Adhesive bra. 6 hours later it was still stuck in place. I was a sweaty mess and that bra still hung on for dear life. Will definitely be purchasing more for future use. Will be fantastic under dresses or tank tops. Gives just the right amount of Push for cleavage even for myself whos not very "Bosomy" as George Costanza would say.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Nieto

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for smaller chests
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great but I would not recommend this for smaller chested girls/women because it doesn’t push up your chest area it kind of just sags which makes it unflatterring. For a smaller chested person your better off finding stick on bras that have a whole covering of your breast so it looks more natural under a blouse, dress etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you verify size- Customer service top notch!!
customer_reviews.text: This review has been edited to reflect the top notch customer service I received! I hadn't even had time to contact the seller to report that I had received the incorrect size and they saw my review and contacted me. Right away they sent me another size and they work perfectly! If they don't work properly and you followed the directions, you may need a different size. Comfort and adhesion is great especially for the price! These do not work when they are size too small. Not the sellers fault as she only sent what I ordered, they do not work properly in a size too small, if anything you might size up to get them to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H.

customer_reviews.title: Odd Fit, Good Rating for Service and Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit as expected, but I think that's because of my cup size (a D). The colour is also more beige than the lighter pink I expected, but that's not a big deal. The stickyness of the bra does not hurt when you take it off, which is a plus. It clasps together well and there are picture instructions to help you use it correctly. Great customer service from the company, they really try to help you fix any issues you have with their products.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana Kalashnik

customer_reviews.title: Way better than others of its kind
customer_reviews.text: I have had several sticky bras from different companies, but this one is superior. I wore it all day with a backless top and the sides never lifted as they have in similar products. It stayed put all day and I’ve even had the chance to wear it again. That’s twice so far with no issues, when other sticky bras are flawed after one use- in my experience. I recommend trying this one out first. It doesn’t have the laces for better cleavage, but I didn’t really care about that.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi-Alise

customer_reviews.title: Company buying 5 Star Reviews BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Do no purchase. These were absolutely awful. I wish I had taken pictures before returning. While the adhesive works there is a terrible seam running around the cups leaving an awkward gap. It honestly feels like going braless but with weird sticking cloths stuck to your chest. I saw an add for these on FB where the company is buying t star reviews, BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Love this bra!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is really great! Not only does it stick on without any sticky feeling or residue but it also makes my breasts look fuller & rounder! I tried wearing it with a few different type of tops just to test it out & I had no problems with its position or with it coming off. I even bounced around a little and it still stayed in place! My breasts are a large B cup so I can only speak for my own size but I really like this bra & I will definitely be purchasing more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay on!
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive does not work!! The bra cups start to lift off within minutes of application. Fashion Forms makes a similar lightweight adhesive bra and retails for around $40. I thought that this could be a less expensive alternative but I was wrong. The Fashion Forms product can be worn and reworn for at least 20 times before the stickiness starts to fade. This product was coming off the skin almost immediately. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Strapless
customer_reviews.text: This is one very comfortable strapless bra. I do know DD and higher sizes need to be made. But I managed to make this one work. This bra is simple yet effective. I was able to wear a few tops with no problem. Others made my breast look funny w the bra. The stickyness was super strong. Make sure to not just rip off bra. Falling asleep in it feels like nothing at all. But still had good hold. I wouldn't use it as a push up. Unless your dress provides it. Then this bra will work great!
customer_reviews.author: CesiLesi

customer_reviews.title: good solution for strapless dresses
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking into bras that will help with the shape and size of my breast when using strapless or dresses with the back uncovered. I love this bra because it helps my breast to be in place but at the same time it does gives me a more rounded shape and make my breast look together. I have one breast bigger than the other one and the breast that is bigger doesn't look as bigger anymore when using this type of bra. I will totally recommend it for strapless and backless dresses or blouses.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Az

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a bra that I can use with a backless outfit that I have for a while. I had previously purchased one that didn’t stick on well. This one is amazing. Sticks without budging and provides lift and coverage that I need. It’s so comfortable that I forget I’m wearing it. Cleaning was simple too, and just to check I tried it on again to check on the adhesive - and it was still perfect! I’m so happy I found a bra to wear with some of my lacy back shirts!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for many!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic solution for those low backed dresses when you aren't comfortable going without some coverage ... and cleavage up front. I love the fact that this came with instructions, otherwise I would have put it on incorrectly and not been happy with it. I wore this for an entire day, only adjusting it a few times. The only down side to this is if you sweat at all it starts to separate from your skin. Not the best on a hot day running errands. Not that big of a deal for me, though. I still am very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Carissa AS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. perfect for clevage.
customer_reviews.text: I want to start this review with a disclaimer that I am a paid reviewer. I am a 38 c. The c cups fit perfectly. The stickiness is enough to stay in place but not too much as they are completely painless to remove. There is not much lift to this bra but if you are simply wanting a backless bra to bring cleavage together in front this is perfect! This company looks to have several other options for different needs and I highly recommend using them as they are reputable and friendly to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: great adhesive bra
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this bra and the adhesive on it, ive bough other sticky bras and the glue on them was terrible. the material is very soft and great quality. the only reason why I don't give it five starts its because its a little small for a D cup. it fits, but I would love a little more coverage. Overall, I think its a great bra and I would recommend it. I got the one the snaps in the middle and I think ill probable try the one that glues on the side next.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: For my larger ladies
customer_reviews.text: Ladies who are larger on top... this review is for you! I’m a 36DDD and was able to wear backless dresses on a recent cruise and feel comfortable. Now I wouldn’t go as far to say I could run or jump while wearing it but it did keep the girls from swinging freely and that’s good enough for me. There aren’t many options out there for larger woman and most can’t support anything larger than a D. But rest assured that you should feel confident in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. C.

customer_reviews.title: Kept the twins lifted all day & night!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this under a bridesmaid dress that had a see-through and it worked great! They felt comfortable, kept the twins lifted all day/night and I completely forgot that I wasn't wearing a real bra. The wedding was in Colorado during October, so I'm not sure how it would hold up in more humid environments. But I imagine they would stick just fine. I'm a 36DD, 5'2, 145 lbs and the E-cup worked best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina J.

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra for medium to small breasts
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases on Amazon. I could never find a strapless bra that stayed put which made it annoying to wear cute strapless tops or tops with thin straps. These are a game changer. I've used these regularly for a year now and they stay put and even provide some lift. I'm not sure how well these would work on women with breasts larger than C cups but they work great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to find a strapless bra for summer and I am SO glad I tried this one. It will be perfect for summer shirts and dresses. I liked that the cups are thick enough to give good coverage. How it clips in the middle provides nice cleavage. And the adhesive was strong enough to last all day. I even went on a bike ride with my son! Easy to remove as well. I would 100% recommend this bra.
customer_reviews.author: BNeedler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quick everyday errands!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t appreciate metal wires and hooks in a bra someone who uses sports bras and nipple tapes so I like the fact it keeps my chest in place and that it does not form a small circular path through the shirt like the usual nipple tape since it's a bra form. I also really like how I can pop it quickly before a grocery run. But also, because it is an ahesive bra you also have to be realistic with your expectations about the lifting effect for the chest area. I wear a size 12 and cup C.
customer_reviews.author: HillT

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: This item is nice as it is imperceptable underneath clothing. My A-B size breasts were covered adequately. The silicone did not adhere for more than 3-4 hours on first wear. I applied following the instructions, after showering and additionally cleansing my skin with alcohol and allowing it to dry completely to ensure no oils would interfere with the silicone adhesion. No dice! It still 'fell off' my skin and I do not sweat!!! It it going back.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Never Buying Another Brand!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried MANY sticky bras & sadly none have worked, until now! I always wanted to wear cute low cut or backless shirts however hated how my bras looked in them. I’ve tried other sticky bras and they couldn’t hold up to my sweat, or my breasts in general. This is a bra that is so easy to apply, and I nearly forget that I’m wearing it! I wear this all day without any issues, and I never have to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Cosplays!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so much better than I thought it would be! I was skeptical at first because I've never tried something like this before and I have larger breasts and didn't think it would look good on me but man I was surprised! It doesn't hurt to take off at all and it was very comfortable. I've used it several days now and it's still just as sticky as the first time. I'm very pleased with my purchase and might have to get more for back up!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It's got grip!
customer_reviews.text: This bra sticks! The adhesive is strong, but as with anything if you sweat a lot or live in humidity you can tell it would come loose from moisture. The fabric is soft, but it's a moulded cup so it has just the right shape. Im a D cup and this bra held my girls in. It took me a couple tries to figure out exactly how to place it and stick the cups on correctly.. I peeled off and restuck several times and it never lost its grip.. but once i did it have it positioned correctly it gave great cleavage without any straps. Definitely recommend for a no strap bra!
customer_reviews.author: B. Fouts

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look right on small chests
customer_reviews.text: This product is not flattering for girls with a large B cup in my opinion. I couldn't get it to look right and it always looked like I had a uni-boob lol. I think if I had bigger breasts it would look and fit better. I recommend getting nipple covers over this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Extra something!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you need a little extra boost or for the girls to be held the right way so they look perfect in that top or dress. For me, it did exactly what I needed it to do. It stayed on all day, gonna try it again to see if it still holds up. Way more comfortable than a traditional bra too. I got the largest size they had and it stays on enough while still giving me some cleavage. I’m a cup size DDD/E.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good for Self-Adhesive Bra
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go under a formal dress. I have a couple of these and was looking for the push-up feature. As with all of these products, I would advise against trying to wear if you know you're going to be sweaty. The adhesive just can't take the moisture. But, overall, this does what it says it does and adheres as well as any other similar product. I like the push-up features for added cleavage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Welsh

customer_reviews.title: 32D is a tricky size!
customer_reviews.text: Since 32D is on the smallest side of the D cup I debated getting a C, but went with D after looking at other reviews... and I’m kind of thinking C would have fit better. The bra is great, sticks will, and good quality, I wish it gave a bit more lift, but I think that could be my sizing issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and great adhesion
customer_reviews.text: Just got this bra today and I love it!! It gives you just the right amount of cleavage without looking like it is pulling your skin too tight. When buying these kind of bras I always worry that it won't be sticky enough to stay, but I was pleasantly surprised at how well it stayed put. If you see my picture you can see how the adhesive is on the entire back side instead of just a section, so it really sticks well. Also, I liked that if it needed to be adjusted it didn't hurt to remove it from my skin. I suggest following the directions it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It works amazing for any backless shirt. I have always been a skeptic about things like this but, I love this bra! I now have the confidence to wear backless shirts due to recent weightloss but never did because I couldn't find a bra. This product is easy to use and stays in place. I highly recommend using this product, it is a game changer!!!
customer_reviews.author: aslhey

customer_reviews.title: YIKES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok ladies, my bust is a bigger one, these did not do anything for me. I have read so many reviews from "big busted" ladies that said they worked great, I don't see how!
customer_reviews.author: Deb M

customer_reviews.title: Good strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bra for when you want to wear something backless or strapless. It adheres well to the skin, and as long as you follow the directions, it is simple to put on and stays in place. This is not a bra to wear to the gym though as excessive sweating will cause it to peel off your skin. The color is a close match for my skin tone. And to emphasize the directions, follow them and wash the cups each time to keep them in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky, but not great for a real A cup.
customer_reviews.text: I was relying on this product to get me through my friend’s wedding as a bridesmaid in my strapless dress! It failed me. I am a 36A and got the A cup, which was too big. The cup itself would ripple which made my breasts look lumpy under my dress. They are very sticky, but kept unsticking. I had to keep going into the bathroom and adjusting them. I followed the directions exactly and they were great for about 30 mins but then failed me!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Actually sticks and supports.
customer_reviews.text: Besides my one noob bigger and breast feeding boobs this held. After the picture I placed it better. And both were supported and stuck the whole time. I’ve used 4 different occasions still sticking. Update I’ve come back from dancing. Which all girls know boobs get sweaty it’s hot. N I was scared but guess what it stood on. No spillage after dancing and twerking lol. A MUST HAVE. really have to place right to get the full effect and awesomeness of the bra.
customer_reviews.author: Joselyne Y Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Takes a bit to get it right
customer_reviews.text: I really like how sticky the cups were. I am planning on using this for my wedding in New orleans next week, which is currently more hot and humid than a sauna in a mens athletic club, so I wanted to make sure the stickiness would hold through that. i think it is going to be fine. I am a large B but at times a small C (im currently nursing) so I got the C. when my breasts are fuller, it is a little awkward fitting so if you are a full/large C, id go one size up so you dont get any weird bulging, otherwise its a great fit when im "deflated" lol
customer_reviews.author: Samantha willis

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I got a D size cup. I'm usually a D. I think I may have been ok with a C, but the D worked just fine. I followed the instructions to put them on one at a time and then hook them together. It worked well that way. They held on all day long without a problem. I wore them with a halter top-dress and they didn't show off the cups at all. I have washed them and ready to wear again.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Reason

customer_reviews.title: Best Sticky Bra I Own
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I was extremely skeptical. I'm a D cup and I've tried every kind of sticky push up bra, but this Sticky Bra worked!!! Having a larger chest can really put a damper on trying to wear cute strapless or backless shirts, partly because you have to worry about the girls falling out. They stay in place, so exciting!! I would recommend these to any girlfriend, sister or daughter. Great buy ⭐
customer_reviews.author: TCStar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bra
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable!!!! I have very sensitive skin and adhesives normally make me break out in hives but this didn't bother my skin at all. It works really well and stays on as long as you don't go for a run or a jump on a trampoline. This works especially great for backless dresses or sheer back dresses/shirts. I'm very excited about this product and plan on getting the other shapes this company has to offer!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsye Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Big Breast Approved
customer_reviews.text: I'm a DD but the D was surprisingly comfortable. It would be nice if it was slightly larger but it worked! The adhesive is all over the inside of the bra and I thought that might make my nipple feel weird but it was like wearing a large nipple cover 😆. It's definitely nice to have to wear with fancy shirts that look better with no bra straps! Don't forget to keep the plastic over the adhesive so that they don't stick to everything lol. Also, so easy to wash! Just throw in a mesh bag and wash in the washer but remember DON'T put them in the dryer! Let them air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ninalizia

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 38DD and this strapless bra is pretty amazing! I did notice it didn't fully cover my side boobs but that didn't affect the look at all. It did exactly what it was suppose to do. It lifted pretty decently and gave me nice cleavage. I normally wear just bralettes and they give me no lift or cleavage, with this strapless bra it's SO COMFORTABLE and I get the added benefit of a push up bra. Definitely a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amilea C

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesion/material
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I was patient trying on this bra because I thought it wasn’t good, but it’s great! It just takes a few adjustments to get it the way you like without losing the strength of the adhesion which was impressive. I like that the material is the same as a regular bra. I have a silicone one and it’s pretty heavy compare to this brand, which is very light and natural.
customer_reviews.author: TraceyU

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those revealing tops and dresses, for a braless look with comfort and security
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical a backless strapless stick on bra would work for me, I purchased a very expensive one from a local department store last year and it never felt comfortable. The design on this one is excellent, I recommend trying it on before your event to practice wearing it with the garment in question so you can make sure you have it adjusted perfectly, but it did just what I needed to stay in place while providing me with peace of mind. I am currently a 36D and wearing the D cup size.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great bra!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bra! Adhesive is sticky even after rinsing it. Easy to use and actually stays. I dont usually use a bra at all but decided to try this and after my baby is done nursing I may get several of these. I will say where I dont wear bras I didn't know what size I am but I got a b. Should have got a c but it's still holding the girls up great just some slight bulge but that is 100% my error so I'm pleased
customer_reviews.author: your.whole.baby.mama7

customer_reviews.title: Stayed on through a sweaty night of dancing
customer_reviews.text: My friend had a small outdoor get together (with only 4 people, thanks COVID!). This stayed on through an entire night outside in 80 degree humid weather dancing with my friends and socializing. I recommend putting bandaids over your nipples to assist in removal, as this bra is super sticky! I have three other sticky bras like this and I think this is my favorite. Theres also a little padding in it that almost seems to provide a bit of pushup. I highly recommend trying this, as I've tried many bras and none of them have stayed on like this.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Yang

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive bra that actually stays in place all day long!
customer_reviews.text: I am really in love with my new adhesive bra! I wear lots of clothing that require that kind of bra and they never stays in place, bras always unsticking, moving and you always have to press you bust to make sure they stick back. This is actually my first adhesive bra that stayed in place all day today, i didn't feel uncomfortable at all even it has been active kinda day! My experience was great and for the price it is a win! Totally recommend to try it on!
customer_reviews.author: Olya

customer_reviews.title: Decent, something to keep in the back of your closet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make my boobs look great in a spaghetti strap dress with a plunging neckline. I tried out this product and it was decent, sticky but I didn't like how it showed through my dress. Plus there was too much spillage so maybe I just needed a larger size. Some of the other reviewers said this fell off after sweating and I have yet to try it out for extended periods of time so I can't speak to that. Oh and about that dress, I decided to go sans bra and my boobs looked even better.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Feng

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer tops!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to replace a previous one from a different brand that had worn out with time. Thankfully, this one is actually even better than the last one. It fits great (true to size), it is comfortable, and it is perfect for under my summer tops that have weird neck lines. The fabric is soft and the adhesive sticks well. The cup shape is good and no bra lines show. Overall, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Christina O.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Was really counting on this bra to work for a dress I purchased for a wedding. Unfortunately, it did not. It worked for the first 10 minutes, but soon after it did not provide any type of support. I’m a small cup- B, so I thought it would hold. Up until I got to the wedding, I repositioned every few minutes. Once I got to the wedding, I gave up and took it off.
customer_reviews.author: XiomaraV

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I received my bra. It was very comfortable and stayed in place better then I expected since I am top heavy. The instructions it came with were easy to comprehend and with using them I was able to to properly apply the product. I have no complaints with this bra, it performs exactly like I was hoping it would. If I had to find a issue with this bra it wouldn't be with the product itself it would be the film used to cover the stickiness. I would not hesitate to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Bra!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, every now and again you find that cute outfit that you love but wearing a regular bra with it just isn't possible and will ruin the look..... This is what you NEED! This bra works GREAT it was very easy to use and surprisingly comfortable. "Held up" ;) well and the fact that it is reusable is a nice feature. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B. Young

customer_reviews.title: Complete Lifesaver!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really unsure about this fitting right. I've never used one before but needed to for a wedding! The type of dress I wore called for one of these. Easier than I thought to put on (comes with visual directions) and this thing STAYED ON ALL DAY. It made it through an entire wedding, tons of dancing, sweating etc. It did not slip or move around once. If you need a sticky front bra, just get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kalena

customer_reviews.title: Amazed of how well this self adhesive push up strapless bra works.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was super fast, came earlier than expected. This self adhesive push up strapless bra is amazing. It does exactly what it states it will. The self adhesive part sticks so well, and when taking the bra off there is no pain whatsoever. Very comfortable and looks great under clothes. It comes with photo instructions, with all the yes’s and no’s how to put it on. I have bras size B and C, so to be on the safe side I decided to go with B cup and it was the right decision as they run lil bit big. Overall a happy customer over here.
customer_reviews.author: Sintija

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the first strapless bra I feel some support in. It’s super sticky adhesive give you just the right amount of lift. I’m a 36C bra size. Make sure you read the instructions on how to apply it. It will be important for the type of hold and support needed. I wore a crop top and they gave the girls a great lift. Not sure how long the adhesive will last. But if needed for only a couple uses I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Anicole

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This bra fits like a dream. This is a boon for someone who really hate annoying tube bras. I personally find tube and transparent belt bras very uncomfortable to wear with backless and strapless dresses, so this is a perfect match for these kinda dresses. At first it took me some time to understand how to use it but once I got it, it's really easy to wear and stay in place. No issues with skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: prachi neema jain

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy, keeps peeling off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the great reviews, but it's falling off my chest as I sit here and write this. The fabric on the outside is great, nice and study, but the sticky side doesn't stay on even though it is sticky to the touch. It slowly starts to peel away until it falls off. It's also quite heavy for something that is supposed to be strapless and adhesive. That's probably why it keeps telling off. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving
customer_reviews.text: At first glance, I was very skeptical but, since I'm lazy and didn't want to go through the trouble to return, I figured I'd give it a chance. Adhesion wasn't great, but it was 90 ° out today. However, it was pretty comfortable and flexible. Placement took a minute, but it seems like it's one of the those that get easier with practice. Overall, I was very satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: Sc

customer_reviews.title: True to it's description
customer_reviews.text: This strapless, backless bra is true to it's description. It holds all day, doesn't leave behind a sticky residue, and is easy to use. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a strapless, backless bra. The item arrived on time and customer support is very fast to respond and also very kind. Overall experience is a five star rating and I will order from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: ~*CosmicBeauty*~

customer_reviews.title: Aren’t as sticky as they should be
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get these bc in store they go for about $20. When I first opened them and took them out of the package they looked super sticky!! But I was disappointed that after wearing them for 15 min I had to keep pushing them against me to sticky. I live in San Diego and don’t sweat so that’s not it. I also did not apply any lotion or oils to the area before wearing my sticky boobs. I did what I always do with my old ones from target that lasted me 2 years. I should of just paid the $20 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Itzamara Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other sticky bras before but this is definitely the best one that I’ve tried so far! The adhesive works really well and you definitely get a lot of use out of it too. It’s true to size and it’s not just for ladies with smaller chest sizes!! The packaging is great too because you can store it inside the reusable bag it came in. I like to use the plastic coverings and put them back on the adhesive to be extra safe too.
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping Great strapless bra !
customer_reviews.text: Super Fast shipping ! STRAPLESS BRA is well made material and fits me great ! Its super sticky and I love how easy it is to put on ! Even while dancing it stuck on my skin ! Just make sure you follow the directions to cleanse skin before applying bra I used soap and washcloth and then rubbing alcohol to get a super strong adhesive and snug fit ! Seller was quick to answer questioned I had and was a pleasure to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: patrick geer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously a must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I would like to start off by saying how amazing this company is. This bra is not only affordable, but also very comfortable and supportive to wear. The stickiness works perfect to keep the bra in place, all while being supportive at the same time. I would highly recommend this bra if you want to wear a backless dress or something simply strapless. I wore it all day with no slippage or having to reapply it.
customer_reviews.author: Chyna Osmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice material, works great.
customer_reviews.text: The bra works great for my small boobs (I'm a 30D/32C). The cups are deeper than other brands of the same size, but the material is soft enough to still hug my girls without leaving embarrassing gap between them and the bra. Initially I got a size B but then exchanged it for a size A because of the deep cups. Might not work so well if you're really flat-chested, but for most people it should work just fine. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Queena

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: As some have mentioned this REALLY sticks to your skin, so you feel safe it won't fall off. I think the "lifting" effect comes from bringing both breasts together and it does work. It takes a couple of tries to get it right but there are instructions to help. It did not work perfectly for me because of how heavy my breasts are and the fact that I possibly needed a larger size. I tried the D and my bra size is 34DD sometimes 34DDD. I'd recommend this product for people with smaller breasts.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well and Stays, Comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best “sticky” bra I’ve ever tried. My daughter is a size B cup. She used this for a strapless gown and we were surprised at the support and coverage. It’s easy to apply if you follow the instructions and photos provided. It’s comfortable without that sticky feeling, even during dancing. It gave her dress a gorgeous look. Her breasts were well covered and lifted. I think it was a great choice. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: There are better sticky bras
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of these at all. I had two different sticky bras before this one that worked better. Literally the second time I wore it, it started slipping on the edges. I only had it on for a couple hours. The other sticky bras I got would stay on after a long day of sweating and moving around. This bra is pretty much worthless. The only reason I’m giving it 2 stars is because it worked for my wedding (barely—it came right off as soon as my dress came off).
customer_reviews.author: Ames

customer_reviews.title: Great wear!
customer_reviews.text: This product like many reviews said before it doesn't wear like a normal bra! It's meant to just cup and lift a little. The instructions confused me a little but I figured it out!!! Being a bustier gal it seemed to work fine! It did fine (for me anyway) when I went on a walk in the heat. They suggest not to as adhesion may not work properly. But it worked fine for me. Would definitely reccomend to anyone who wants to go without straps!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Stayed in place
customer_reviews.text: Thankful for the written and picture instructions! This bra made my 36b nursed 5 kids boobs look amazing! It stayed on all evening for me, washed with warm water and mild soap, let air dry and the sticky came right back. It did get a little itchy when I started to sweat from dancing but luckily that wasn’t till toward the end of my evening.
customer_reviews.author: RENA BAXTER

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday bra
customer_reviews.text: This sticky bra has silicone on the inside and fabric on the outside. It is thicker than other ones I have tried. I would suggest this for more everyday wear, under shirts or dresses. Cons: It doesn’t push your boobs together as much as other styles. I would wear a different design if I was going out and needed a sticky bra. Pros: I like this one because the shape makes it easy to clean and the thicker material means the silicone stays clean and in better shape than others I have tried. I expect it to last a lot of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cai

customer_reviews.title: 32D order the D not the C
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 32D and was skeptical that the D cup would fit because it’s the smallest of the D’s. I ordered a C because in other sticky bras the C was the right fit, and while the C cup should hopefully fit I should have definitely of ordered a D cup. I still rated this product 5 stars because the size guide told me to buy the D cup.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth patelli

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bra. I have used this type of bra before and it was a disaster. This bras stays in place. It does not feel as if it is to tight. Great coverage of the breast. Does not leave lines. Love the fact that it is seamless. Will work great for when I dress up and wear my nice shirts that normally would show straps. Was so excited to receive this bra and was 100% satisfied with it. Could not ask for a better bra.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Lasts hours and no irritation
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for a New Year's Eve party and it didn't slip all night! 7 hrs no movement and no irritation despite hours of dancing. Stayed sticky even though I adjusted ~3 times while getting ready. I usually can't have the sticky part right on the center but it did not irritate. Totally recommend. (Cannot use medical terms review was marked sensitive)
customer_reviews.author: TFS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product even for “mom boobs” I’ve breastfed 3 kids and I’m not exactly perky. But these have great stick and hold me up enough. I just received them so not sure how long they’ll remain sticky, l but they seem durable. I will say it runs a little small. I’m a good c and I could have ordered D size and probably would have been a better fit. Overall I’m pleased
customer_reviews.author: Kayla adams

customer_reviews.title: Best Strapless Bra Ever
customer_reviews.text: OMG..This strapless bra is the best, when I wore this bra, I moved around so much, it did not move out of place or fall off... It was so comfortable and easy to apply, I was amazed how simply it was to apply. I have worn this bra several times and still feels like the first time... only adhesive bra I’m ordering from now on
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to get your cleavage back:)
customer_reviews.text: After having nursed 3 babies, there's not much left to my chest. Trying to find some bra support that is hidden for strapless/backless outfits is really hard to do. I came across this backless adhesive bra and really liked it. The adhesive is strong but still comfortable to wear and it worked exactly as stated. It created cleavage where I no longer have any, and I was able to wear it under my bathing suit too without it showing. Would definitely reorder again!
customer_reviews.author: SeychelleK

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked this bra but didn’t 100% love it. I am normally a c-cup but ordered a size up just to be safe. It fit just perfectly. My only gripe is the adhesive sticks to your entire nipple. When you peel it off, it’s peeling of your nipple too. NOT a great feeling. There should be padding or something there to protect it. Otherwise, I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: It did the job
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size and is pretty good quality. Only rated at four stars because the adhesive won’t stick when it’s hot out. “Hot” apparently means 70 degrees and I had to keep sticking the cups back on during a wedding -_-. If this would stick better during warm weather, it would be five stars. Thankfully I live in an area that’s cold 10 months out of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST backless bra!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bra! I wore this one all day around the house just to test it out and I am pleased! The adhesive is strong, but still comfortable to remove. I have tried similar ones in the past that said they were re-usable, but didn’t hold up. After a quick rinse & air dry, it was just as sticky as before. Save the plastic that comes on the cups for storage (also came with a convenient bag). I am either an A or a B, depending on the bra. I sized down to an A for this one, but I think a B would have worked just as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely Self Adhesive Invisible Bra. Never thought that this bra will work so good for me.It doesn’t slip and feels very comfortable. Push up effect makes my brests look amazing. I have very sensitive skin so have to wear only good quality underwear. This bra is definitely made of very good material, because after wearing for a long time, I didn’t feel discomfort. Very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Justin brand

customer_reviews.title: Very sticky, in a good way!
customer_reviews.text: Could have offered bigger sizes, but the D works fine. Did the jump test, didn't slip. Pulled on and off several times to check for stickiness and they never lost there stickiness. I'm overall very impressed with this product. Even comes with a step by step guide on how to install and a bag to store them in when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Riggan

customer_reviews.title: Great bra, no lift
customer_reviews.text: I got the opportunity to try this bra for free, and it is made very well. My boobs don't lime being suffocated like this though and got very itchy. It could be an allergic reaction but I don't think so because there was no redness upon removal. If the product offered better support it would be a 5 stars for me. I won't be getting rid of it but it definitely won't be worn very often
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Wright

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed that I was able to wear these for a full day at OBX in 90 degree weather and they did not slip at ALL. I also love that i can change the placement to affect perkiness/push up. For reference I wear a DD out of Victoria Secrets and i for sure thought this did a great job. I started wearing them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: CharBear

product_meta.title: MITALOO Push up Strapless Self Adhesive Plunge Bra Invisible Backless Sticky Bras
feature_bullets: Self adhesive breathable mango-shaped bra creates a busty,fuller and charming deep v shape breast;Sexy V shape design, fits for your breasts .

SOFT MATERIAL - The backless strapless invisible bra is made of natural, soft and healthy material. It has biological glue inside the the cup to help keep the wedding backless bra attached to the breast.
PUSH UP DESIGN - This strapless push up lift bra creates the appearance of increased cleavage.Get extra cleavage without the bra straps and say goodbye to all embarrassing occasions!
A MUST backless bra in any Woman’s Wardrobe: Backless bra is suitable for wedding gown, low-cut outfits, prom and homecoming dress or any formal evening dress.

WASHABLE & REUSABLE - Reusable bra, but too much sweat will affect stickiness, so the Silicone Push-up Adhesive Bra is not suitable for using in high temperature outdoors or doing exercise.Simply hand wash with running water after each use and air dry it.
